TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpRequestCachePolicy extends System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy

summary.span: 为通过使用 对象获取的资源定义应用程序的缓存要求。

span.span: Defines an application's caching requirements for resources obtained by using objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过使用属性或应用程序或计算机配置文件来指定应用程序的默认缓存策略。You can specify a default cache policy for your application by using the property or the application or machine configuration files. 有关详细信息, 请[ <参阅> requestCaching 元素 (网络设置)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/requestcaching-element-network-settings.md)。For more information, see [<requestCaching> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/requestcaching-element-network-settings.md). 可以通过使用属性为单个请求指定缓存策略。You can specify the cache policy for an individual request by using the property. 不支持 Web 服务的缓存。Caching for Web services is not supported. ## Examples 下面的代码示例为应用程序域创建默认缓存策略, 并将其重写为请求。The following code example creates a default cache policy for the application domain, and overrides it for a request. [!code-cpp[NclSimpleCache#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CPP/NCLSimpleCache.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NclSimpleCache#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CS/example.cs#2)]

related.span: 网络应用程序的缓存管理

span.span: Cache Management for Network Applications

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.DateTime cacheSyncDate) cil managed

param.name: cacheSyncDate
param.span: 一个 对象，它指定必须重新验证缓存中存储的资源的时间。

span.span: A object that specifies the time when resources stored in the cache must be revalidated.

summary.span: 使用指定的缓存同步日期初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified cache synchronization date.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓存同步日期允许指定必须重新验证缓存内容的绝对日期。The cache synchronization date allows you to specify an absolute date when cached contents must be revalidated. 如果缓存项是在缓存同步日期之前最后重新验证的, 则会发生服务器的重新验证。If the cache entry was last revalidated prior to the cache synchronization date, revalidation with the server occurs. 如果缓存项在缓存同步日期之后重新验证, 且没有服务器重新验证要求使缓存条目无效, 则使用缓存中的条目。If the cache entry was revalidated after the cache synchronization date and there are no server revalidation requirements that make the cached entry invalid, the entry from the cache is used. 如果缓存同步日期设置为未来某个日期，则每次请求时都会重新验证该条目，直到缓存同步日期过去。If the cache synchronization date is set to a future date, the entry is revalidated every time it is requested, until the cache synchronization date passes. 此构造函数将 属性初始化为 。This constructor initializes the property to . 将 属性初始化为 `cacheSyncDate`。The property is initialized to `cacheSyncDate`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何基于缓存同步日期创建缓存策略。The following code example demonstrates creating a cache policy based on a cache synchronization date. [!code-cpp[NclSimpleCache#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CPP/NCLSimpleCache.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NclSimpleCache#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CS/example.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Net.Cache.HttpRequestCacheLevel level) cil managed

span.span: An value.

summary.span: 使用指定的缓存策略初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified cache policy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数将 属性初始化为 `level`。This constructor initializes the property to `level`. 值控制是否启用缓存, 以及何时可以使用缓存。The value controls whether caching is enabled, and when the cache can be used. 有关其他信息, 请参阅文档。For additional information, see the documentation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建缓存策略, 以允许从缓存中使用在缓存中找到的资源。The following code example demonstrates creating a cache policy that allows resources found in the cache to be used from the cache. [!code-cpp[NclSimpleCache#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CPP/NCLSimpleCache.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[NclSimpleCache#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CS/example.cs#12)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值定义`ageOrFreshOrStale`参数值的含义, 并用于设置关联的属性。 `cacheAgeControl`The `cacheAgeControl` value defines the meaning of the `ageOrFreshOrStale` parameter value and is used to set the associated property. 例如, 在指定时 , 属性设置`ageOrFreshOrStale`为参数的值。For example, when you specify , the property is set to the value of the `ageOrFreshOrStale` parameter. 此构造函数将 属性初始化为 。This constructor initializes the property to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建基于最小新鲜度的缓存策略。The following code example demonstrates creating a cache policy based on minimum freshness. summary.span: 获取此实例的缓存同步日期。

span.span: Gets the cache synchronization date for this instance.

span.span: A value set to the date specified when this instance was created.

value.span: 如果未指定日期，此属性的值则为 。

span.span: If no date was specified, this property's value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓存同步日期允许指定必须重新验证缓存内容的绝对日期。The cache synchronization date allows you to specify an absolute date when cached contents must be revalidated. 如果缓存项是在缓存同步日期之前最后重新验证的, 则会发生服务器的重新验证。If the cache entry was last revalidated prior to the cache synchronization date, revalidation with the server occurs. 如果缓存项在缓存同步日期之后重新验证, 且没有服务器重新验证要求使缓存条目无效, 则使用缓存中的条目。If the cache entry was revalidated after the cache synchronization date and there are no server revalidation requirements that make the cached entry invalid, the entry from the cache is used. 如果缓存同步日期设置为未来某个日期，则每次请求时都会重新验证该条目，直到缓存同步日期过去。If the cache synchronization date is set to a future date, the entry is revalidated every time it is requested, until the cache synchronization date passes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示此属性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NclSimpleCache#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CPP/NCLSimpleCache.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NclSimpleCache#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CS/example.cs#3)]

summary.span: 获取创建此实例时指定的 值。

span.span: Gets the value that was specified when this instance was created.

value.span: 一个 值，该值指定使用 对象获取的资源的缓存行为。

span.span: A value that specifies the cache behavior for resources that were obtained using objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序通常使用作为其缓存策略级别。Applications typically use as their cache policy level. 如果 不`null`是, 则属性将确定对请求有效的缓存策略。The property, if not `null`, determines the cache policy in effect for a request. 可以使用属性或计算机或应用程序配置文件中的设置来设置应用程序域的默认策略。The default policy for the application domain can be set using the property or by settings in the machine or application configuration files. 有关详细信息, 请[ <参阅> requestCaching 元素 (网络设置)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/requestcaching-element-network-settings.md)。For more information, see [<requestCaching> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/requestcaching-element-network-settings.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示此属性的值。The following code example demonstrates displaying the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NclSimpleCache#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CPP/NCLSimpleCache.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[NclSimpleCache#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CS/example.cs#11)]

value.span: 如果未指定日期，此属性的值则为 。

span.span: If no date was specified, this property's value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果资源的缓存副本早于指定的时间值, 则必须重新验证资源。If the cached copy of the resource is older than the specified time value, the resource must be revalidated. 此属性的值是在构造实例时指定的。The value for this property is specified when the instance is constructed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示此属性的值。The following code example demonstrates displaying the value of this property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定在内容过期后, 资源的缓存副本可接受的时间量。This property specifies the amount of time after content expiration during which the cached copy of the resource is acceptable. 此属性的值是在构造实例时指定的。The value for this property is specified when the instance is constructed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示此属性的值。The following code example demonstrates displaying the value of this property.
